short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the percentage difference between two numbers. That's it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes, you just need to calculate the percentage difference between two numbers. This plugin allows you to do that. Pretty neat, huh?
